title: Is Shurima Completed?
body:
Did Riot complete the Shurima storyline with just a cliffhanger, or is it going to continue at a later date? There are so many questions to be answered:
Will Taliyah find her family?
Will Renekton finally confront his brother?
Will Nasus get a doggy treat? 
Who is a good boy? Who is a good boy?
Find out next time on Shurima Ball Z!
Or not, if it's done...

replies.body: There will be a chapter 3... but not for a while.
I figured we would take a break from Shurima for a while after *Bloodlines*. I just wonder for how long & what lore we get in the meantime. I guess I will find out in due time.

Lets put it this way, with the retcon, each faction needs their "chapter one" before they can move further. So far we have Bilgwater, the Shadow Isles, Shurima, Targon, and [to a lesser extent] the Freljord.
Bilgewater already has a second installement (*Shadow and Fortune*).
But that was also the complementary Harrowing story, which happens every year.
I'd argue that Shurima already had a chapter one awhile ago.  I think they're more just aligning the mass retcons with champion releases or reworks.

Ok starting one storyline that i awesome like shurima's and "taking a break" for weak ones is lame. no one cares about diana's sweet ass or leona's perky breasts, least of all some forgotten mountain where a spartan reject lives...
